entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Matane
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:27 AM EST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming north 20 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 1. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 06 March 2023
